dict.string:
[[ -z "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" ]] && exit_show_tool_tip "Nothing is selected."
url=$(expand -t $TM_TAB_SIZE|curl 2>/dev/null http://paste.textmate.org/submit -F user="$USER" -F text='<-')
[[ -z "$url" ]] && exit_show_tool_tip "Got no URL back from pasting service."
if grep <<<"$(ps -xc)" -sq "Colloquy$"; then osascript -e 'tell application "Colloquy" to send message "pasted '"$url"'" action tense yes to (get chat room "##textmate" of (first connection where server address is equal to "irc.freenode.net"))' echo "The selection was pasted to #textmate." else echo -n "$url" | pbcopy echo "The selection is available as $url" echo "For your convenience, the URL was placed on the clipboard." fi
